profile:
For over 15 years Smart Roofing Inc. has provided full service roofing for residential, commercial and industrial customers throughout the Greater Toronto Area. Our skilled, experienced craftsmen, aided by the reliable products, can accurately assess your roofing situation and expedite any job quickly and to your full satisfaction. 

We are dedicated to providing quality, professional installation and service commitment with fair prices. For your protection we are fully insured, bonded and licensed, and are proud members of the Better Business Bureau. We offer from 6 to 15-year written guarantee on our workmanship and only experienced crews of roofers are used. Smart Roofing has maintained these standards over the years and will continue to do such as our family of satisfied customers grows and shares their experience with peers, family and friends. 

Please contact us today for a free estimate or visit our showroom. At Smart Roofing Inc. "We protect what you value most". Make the SMART choice.
_____________________________________________
Cedar Shingles,Cedar Shake,Fiberglass Plastic Tiles, Enviro Shake, Metal and Flat Roofs as well as eavestrough, soffit, fascia, siding and copper work, skylight installation, full roof inspections

profile:
Gutter Force was started in an observation that eavestrough cleaning was a hazardous job that if done differently could make it safer and avoid people falling off ladders and seriously hurting themselves.

We have evolved into a unique specialized home service company in eavestroughing . We have three primary services that we provide; Eavestrough repair ,eavestrough replacement or installation,  Aluminum Soffit and fascia exterior makeovers.

Gutter Force is under professional management by team of experts is knowledgeable,skilled and dedicated. We pride ourselves in excellent customer satisfaction.


Gutter Force offer eavestrough installation and repair as well as gutter and downpipe repair or replacement,downspout disconnection, soffit and fascia installation, ice dam removal and more in Toronto and area.

profile:
Hello, 

My name is Tommy Hrstic and I am the owner of Sunrise Aluminum.  I have 20 years of hands on experience in the industry, and Sunrise Aluminum has been serving the greater Toronto area and beyond for more than 15 years and counting.  We specialize in seamless aluminum eaves trough installations, along with large square downspouts which has been the industry standard for the vast majority of residential homes and many commercial properties over the past decade.  We have remained a small company and all your interactions will be be with me directly and all our work is done or overseen by me personally to ensure the highest quality and customer satisfaction.  We use only the highest quality materials and aluminum purchased from reputable suppliers (Gentek and Kaycan) with many colours and materials to chose from.  

At Sunrise Aluminum we have always placed customer satisfaction as our number one priority, and have had continued success mostly thanks to their positive feedback and referrals.  With us you can always expect top quality product and workmanship for a fair price, and you can always count on us to complete your job in a timely manner as we pride ourselves in our commitment to punctuality, efficiency, and reliability.  

Contact us for a free estimate and consultation, we look forward to working with you.


Tommy Hrstic
Sunrise Aluminum
products:
-seamless aluminum eavestrough
-large square downspouts
-leaf guard
-aluminum fascia
-aluminum soffits
services: Various types of aluminum installations for home exterior.
warranty_terms: 5 years on workmanship, 25 years on materials
